Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: S. Norris
Reviews.Content: I have been using it for almost a year. It takes pretty decent pictures ,however you have to keep the phone very still for at least 2 seconds after you press the button. It is very easy to use , never froze or dropped calls. The radio feature is very nice because you don't have to have the internet connection to listen to the radio.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Quality Phone
Reviews.Author: Phone Reviewer "Cell Phone Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: This phone is one of the worst phone that I've ever had.- Freezes- Drops calls- Have to take out the battery and wait for it to restart
